function.name: es_termsagg
function.description: Creates an aggregation name grouped by field as a child of aggregation parent. Returns a string identifier that can be used to identify this filter.Two sibling or same-level aggregations cannot have the same name. Children of this aggregation should be created with es_statsagg ().

example.description: Create an aggregation “sort_color” and group by the color field:
Create an aggregation “authors” that includes a field “stats” containing statistics for the “price” field grouped by “author”:
